Sept 8 & 9, 2013, New Orleans

Leverage your exchange

Date & Location
September 8-9, 2013
New Orleans, LA

Registration Fees
  • $599 per attendee for 1 *
  • $499 per attendee for 2 attendees *
  • $399 per attendee for 3+ attendees *

Registration is closed

Federated Sample is excited to announce the first annual SampleCon being held September 8th & 9th, 2013 in New Orleans, LA during the AMA’s Annual Marketing Conference.

SampleCon will bring together the creators, innovators and leaders who are shaping the future of market research sampling. A participant-driven event without a predefined agenda, SampleCon is a truly unique opportunity to be part of a day filled with unbridled discussion, demonstration and debate. With no boundaries, come prepared to participate as you define the content and drive the discussion.

Brought to you by Federated Sample

  • Registration fees will increase by $100 after Sunday, August 18th
  • Last day for cancellations on attendee registrations with a refund is August 25th, 2013. Registration transfers are available. If you need to transfer a registration please email us at samplecon@federatedsample.com.
  • SampleCon reserves the right to include attendee names and companies in event materials.

Hotel & Venue Information

Rooms for SampleCon attendees have been secured at the Westin New Orleans Canal Place and we are pleased to offer a discounted rate of $129, plus tax. Additional details are listed below.

Conference Hotel
Westin New Orleans Canal Place
100 Rue Iberville
New Orleans, LA 70130
Ph: (504) 566-7006
Rate: $129 (rate excludes all taxes and fees)

The Westin New Orleans Canal Place is adjacent to the historical French Quarter and offers sweeping views of the beautiful Mississippi River, making it the perfect downtown New Orleans hotel to savor the Big Easy's zest for living. Just steps from popular attractions and things to do in New Orleans including Jackson Square, the New Orleans Convention Center, the luxurious Shops at Canal Place, Harrah's Casino, museums, art galleries, dining and the central business district, you will enjoy comfort and service from our French Quarter hotel that will make you feel right at home. Enjoy complimentary high speed or wireless internet access in your guestroom and wireless access in our lobby.

  • Hotel reservations can be made via telephone or online, please reference "SampleCon" for this special group rate.
  • To book online, please visit the Westin’s SampleCon hotel reservation page.
  • To book via telephone, please call (504) 566-7006 and please reference "SampleCon" for this special group rate.
  • The discounted rate of $129 is available until Monday, August 26 at 6:00 PM EST. Reservations made after August 26 are subject to availability and an increase in price.

All of daytime-scheduled events will take place at the Westin New Orleans Canal Place on the 12th floor. Evening events will be held at Federated Sample's New Orleans Headquarters (365 Canal Street, 7th floor, New Orleans, 70130).
